titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation inhibiting all persons to repaire to His Maiestie for cure of the disease called, the kings euill, vntill Michaelmas next.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: And by the Assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at Our Palace of VVestminster, the seuenth day of April, in the twelfth yeere of Our Reigne."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
